original_text: But I would have you without carefulness. He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord:
korean_text: 너희가 염려 없기를 원하노라 장가 가지 않은 자는 주의 일을 염려하여 어찌하여야 주를 기쁘시게 할까 하되

sentences.original_text: But I would have you without carefulness
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 너희가 염려 없이 있기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: careth for the things that belong to the Lord
how he may please the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 하면 주를 기쁘시게 할까 하고
